channel.title: Need help with item spawnpoints
channel.description: ok, under the java file "itemspawnpoints" i copied one of the current spawns and put it right under it and changed it to spawn p hats and fire capes and i saved and compiled but when i go into the game, all the items but the ones i added are there, i can't figure out whats wrong, can anyone help?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2007, 05:03:44 PM[/size][hr]come on people, i know someone knows about this since every server has custom spawnpoints

item.title: Need help with item spawnpoints
item.dc:creator: @iran4life iran4life
item.description:
@iran4life wrote:

hmmmmm.i say put the spawntimer for 3.so ur admins can spawn quikly.or put it more.first spawn all ur stuff.then change it so they can fast spawn

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with item spawnpoints
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

depends, how long you waited you might want to change the spawntimer

Check mine and see if yours is similar.

public void LoadItems() { for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) { if (spawntimer <= 1) { ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape spawntimer = 100; } } }

Read full topic
